item.title: L-TTA: Lightweight Test-Time Adaptation Using a Versatile Stem Layer
item.description: L-TTA: A lightweight test-time adaptation method using a versatile stem layer minimizes channel-wise uncertainty for rapid and memory-efficient adaptation to new domains.
